title: 752. Week 14 Big Games, Rookie QB Report & Breaking Down Urban Meyer's Struggles
itunes:title: 752. Week 14 Big Games, Rookie QB Report & Breaking Down Urban Meyer's Struggles
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis look back at the weekend and all the action from Week 14 of the NFL season. The guys start by breaking down the big 3 games from Sunday. Next, the trio discuss teams and players that have regrets or no regrets from this week. Following that, the guys preview the Monday Night Football matchup between the Los Angeles Rams and Arizona Cardinals. After that, the trio look at the teams on their bye week and what they need to work on during it. Then, the guys give a grade to the rookie quarterbacks based off their Week 14 performances. Next, the trio look at the tension in Jacksonville between Jaguars head coach Urban Meyer and their players. To wrap up the show, the trio discuss quarterback Russell Wilson's future in Seattle.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
